Context:
* The text mentions that George Brown College offers Academic and Career Entrance (ACE) level courses and distance programs for academic upgrading in collaboration with TVO ILC Ontario Online High School, GBC's Toronto Adult Day/Night Schools, and 2ACE.
* There are multiple levels of courses available, including ACE level courses.
* Five Adult Day schools and eight Night schools are available throughout the city, offering full-time and part-time options for adult learners with intakes available throughout the year.
* Entry Advisors provide one-on-one sessions, workshops, and information sessions to help individuals navigate educational programs and pathways, providing information and/or referrals.
* To contact George Brown College, you can call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* The college's social media hub can also be visited for more information.
* The text advises individuals to verify the admission requirements of their program and institution of choice to ensure that ACE credits meet the listed program admission requirements.
* The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
